name: Dr. Sunita Sharma
bio: Dr. Sharma is a leading psychiatrist specializing in supporting mothers through their postpartum journey. With over a decade of experience, she offers compassionate, evidence-based care to help women navigate the challenges of motherhood.

name: Rajesh Thapa
bio: Rajesh Thapa helps families navigate the challenges of postpartum mental health with compassion and evidence-based therapies. He is skilled in creating a safe and supportive environment for new mothers and their partners.

name: Dr. Anjali Gurung
bio: Dr. Gurung has extensive experience in treating a wide range of mental health issues affecting new mothers, with a special focus on anxiety and mood disorders during the perinatal period.

name: Bikash Shrestha
bio: Bikash Shrestha is a dedicated counselor working in community health. He is known for his culturally sensitive approach, helping mothers and families understand and address mental health in a way that respects tradition.
